ygData.subject: 3 questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, I have a few questions this morning for everyone. 1)  Which room in Mistmoore is the home of the gypsy lute dropping gypsies?  How do I get there?
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

I have a few questions this morning for everyone.

1) Which room in Mistmoore is the home of the gypsy lute dropping gypsies? How do I get there? Is there a secret way (i.e. through the secret room in the graveyard) which could be less hazardous to a group of around 30's? (I too share Shada's propensity for being lost - hehe. My train hotkey shouts "TRAIN TO......UM......Just watch out!") Once I get to said room, how difficult a place is it? 3 spawns, 4?

2) Where are Choon and Froon (I've spent the vast majority of my time on the East coast, so I'm not too familiar with the Karanas)? About what level are they? Is it possible to pull one without the other?

And in another non-related vein:

Can anyone please post or supply the web address to a comprehensive list of Bard skill caps? And once more, where do you have to go to train that first point in Instill Doubt?

Thanks ahead of time for all the help,

Weiland
<Disciples of Truth>
Erollisi Marr
